nodes.text: Kel'sara was a female humanoid commander of the Dread Host during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. She, Heirad, and Ciphas were part of the forces that accompanied Kephess to Asation, and the trio fell in battle while guarding the path to the Grand Hypergate through the Quadrilateral Forum. She wielded a yellow double-bladed lightsaber in battle.
Kel'sara, along with Heirad and Ciphas, appear collectively as the second boss in "Terror From Beyond," an Operation in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
